[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:OperatingLeaseIncomeComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome is included.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome Value : 243,000 Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1007587/000100758722000003/kvhi-20211231.htm 4
